description.description: Allow user execute/modify access of Stored Queries when F6 (query) key is pressed from any application. Modify

access is defined as being able to modify a stored query "on the fly", not modifying the query database. The user will be able to perform any Stored Query which has been assigned to him/her or a group which they belong to (group access list in operator record). In addition, this user will be able to do a "one time" modification of the query before executing it. They do not have access to update the query file.
